songsTitle: a clock where the time is in a song title

songsMethod.value: Each minute, two random songs are selected and played that contain the time in the title (whether exact or part of it).

All possible songs including times were queried using the Spotify API. Up to 10 were selected for each minute after sorting by a few factors (like popularity, likelihood it is a time reference, US market, etc). Only three minutes have no results: 6:58, 9:07, and 9:49.
